definition: tear or rupture/to have a tear (e.g. in one's clothes)/without restraint (e.g. of swearing)
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls

sentences.english: His final breakthrough came when he obtained a copy of a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 賈維斯最終在一份手稿上的複印件上找到了突破口。

sentences.english: He hit his head as he stood up and cursed loudly.
sentences.chinese: 他站起來時撞了頭，便破口大罵。

sentences.english: It is a breach for agriculture and animal husbandry to bring grass field rotate into planting system.
sentences.chinese: 把草田輪作納入種植體制中是農牧結合的突破口。

sentences.english: When the age of Ugly philosophy approaches, the breakthrough first happens in literature.
sentences.chinese: 醜學時代來臨時，最先在文藝領域找到了突破口。

sentences.english: The study of history of journalism should be based on historiography, which can offer guidance in terms of methodology and epistemology.
sentences.chinese: 對新聞史的研究要以認識和掌握歷史學科爲突破口。

sentences.english: On April 28th Mr Ma secured a long-sought breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 4月28日，馬先生得到一個長期尋找的突破口。

sentences.english: All he saw honor send home namely faces, unknown so honor.
sentences.chinese: 全見榮送玥回家即破口大罵，榮不明所以。

sentences.english: The driver was slanging a pedestrian who had got in his way.
sentences.chinese: 那司機破口大罵擋他的路的行人。

sentences.english: Wind power generation equipment market becomes the breakthrough point of Jushi Group.
sentences.chinese: 風力發電裝置成爲巨石集團的突破口。

sentences.english: Look for holes in the market that will help you define your niche.
sentences.chinese: 尋找市場突破口，這將有助於你定位你的利基羣體。

sentences.english: I can catch the last shout abuse, or knees to detain him.
sentences.chinese: 我可以追過去破口大罵，或者雙膝跪地挽留他。

sentences.english: Relay-based communication architecture is becoming a breakthrough of future mobile communication networks.
sentences.chinese: 基於中繼的通信架構正成爲移動通信網發展的突破口。

sentences.english: Larger holes and cuts in tires can be repaired by applying a patch on the inside.
sentences.chinese: 較大的輪胎破口和切口可用補胎片在內側進行修補。

sentences.english: She shouted abuse without any restraint.
They came [upon me] as a wide breaking in [of waters]: in the desolation they rolled themselves [upon me].
sentences.chinese: 他們來如同闖進大破口，在毀壞之間滾在我身上。

sentences.english: Ye have seen also the breaches of the city of David, that they are many: and ye gathered together the waters of the lower pool.
sentences.chinese: 你們看見大衛城的破口很多，便聚積下池的水。

definition: hole/opening/cut/gap/gash/my husband or wife/classifier for people (used for indicating the number of people in a family etc)/precedent
to rupture/to burst open/to break up
bloody mouth (from devouring freshly killed prey)
to wear out (clothes)/to pierce (a membrane etc)
